import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Container, Jumbotron, Button, Card, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { PDFDownloadLink, Document, Page, Text, Font} from '@react-pdf/renderer' import {styles} from './utils/PDFStyles'; import {getLawsPDF, getBestPracticesPDF } from './utils/PDFUtils'; import {getLaws, getBestPractices} from './utils/ObligationsUtils'; class Info extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } saveInformation = (e, value) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.handleChange(value); } createDocument = () => { const {locations, isPersonalInfo} = this.props; // Create styles Font.register({ family: 'Oswald', src: 'https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/oswald/v13/Y_TKV6o8WovbUd3m_X9aAA.ttf' }); return ( ~ D-Path Tool ~ OBLIGATIONS AND REQUIREMENTS Epishare { (isPersonalInfo) ? getLawsPDF(locations) : null } { getBestPracticesPDF() } ( `${pageNumber} / ${totalPages}` )} fixed /> ) } getLawCards = () => { return(
1 Act Respecting Access to Documents held by Public Bodies 2 Act Respecting the Sharing of Certain Health Information 3 Act to Establish a Legal Framework for Information Technology 4 Act Respecting Healthcare Services and Social Services 5 PIPEDA Principles
) } getBestPracticesCards = () => { return(
1 GA4GH Framework 2 GA4GH Data Privacy and Security Policy 3 GA4GH Data Security Infrastructure Policy 4 IHEC 5 ISO 27799 & 27001
) } render(){ const {locations, isPersonalInfo} = this.props; const MyDoc = () => this.createDocument(); return(

Obligations and requirements

{ isPersonalInfo ? this.getLawCards() : null }

{ isPersonalInfo ? getLaws(locations) : null }

{ this.getBestPracticesCards() }

{ getBestPractices() }

} fileName="ObligationsAndRequirements.pdf">
) } } export default Info;
